cards.title: Speedrunner
powers: The next time {Speedrunner} would be dealt damage, reduce it by 1 and draw 1 card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Player may Play a card now.
One Player may Discard 2 cards. If they do, they may Draw 2 cards.
Reveal the Top card of the Villain Deck, then replace it.

openingLines.default: going for a pb this time, don't forget to subscribe!
openingLines.Menagerie.UnmuteCharacter: you're not wrong. hey wait. do you see aiden too? he's a wizard with clippers and shears.

cards.title: Arbitrary Code Execution
body: When this card enters play, put a one-shot card from each trash under it.
When this card is destroyed, first put each card from under it into play, in any order.
powers: Put 1 one-shot card from your hand under this card. Destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “And if we kick that blade{BR}battalion at exactly this position,{BR}[b]bam![/b] early mdp bridge.”

cards.title: Frame-perfect Timing
body: When {Speedrunner} would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to the villain target with the lowest HP. If you do, either increase it by 2, draw 1 card, or play 1 card. Then destroy this card.
powers: {Speedrunner} deals 1 target 1 irreducible melee damage. This damage cannot be redirected.
cards.flavorText: “You fools!{BR}Can you not hit one tiny human!?”

cards.title: Half A-Press
body: When you move a card to your trash, place it under this card instead. When you use a power or draw a card, add 1 token to this card.

When this card is destroyed, {Speedrunner} deals 1 target projectile damage equal to the number of cards under this card, then that target deals {Speedrunner} radiant damage equal to the number of tokens on this card.
cards.flavorText: “The existence of quad-parallel{BR}universes is only theoretical.”

cards.title: H.O.T.A.S.
body: When this card is destroyed, destroy 1 ongoing card and {Speedrunner} deals up to 2 targets 3 fire damage each.
powers: {Speedrunner} deals each non-hero target 1 projectile damage. You may destroy this card.

cards.title: Input Buffer
body: When this card enters play, draw 2 cards.
powers: Discard any number of cards. {Speedrunner} deals 1 target X energy damage, where X = the number of cards discarded this way plus 2.

cards.title: Inventory Overrun
body: Each player reveals cards from the top of their deck until an equipment card is revealed. They put that card in their hand and shuffle the other revealed cards back into their deck.
One player may play a card now.

cards.title: No Clipping
body: You may destroy an environment card. If you do, {Speedrunner} regains 2 HP. If not, play the top card of the environment deck, then you may use a power.
cards.flavorText: “just a quick trip through hell.{BR}normal Tuesday for{BR}the doom slayer, right?”

cards.title: Original Hardware
body: Reduce damage dealt to {Speedrunner} by 1.
powers: Choose glitch or strat. Discard a card with that keyword. If you do, search your deck for a card with that keyword, put it in your hand or into play, then shuffle your deck.

cards.title: Out of Bounds
body: When this card enters play, reveal the top card of the environment deck and place it under this card. Then {Speedrunner} deals 1 target 2 psychic damage.
powers: Move an environment card in play under this card. If you do, put a different card from under this card into play. If you do, {Speedrunner} deals 1 target 2 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: “Are you sure this is the way?{br}my eyes and ears don't match.”

cards.title: Repeated Backflips
body: Draw a card. Discard a card. Play a card.
{Speedrunner} may deal zirself 2 irreducible melee damage. If ze does, repeat the above text.
Another player may use a power now.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't think ze's{br}going any faster.

cards.title: Reset Warp
body: Discard your hand.
Draw 4 cards.
Play 1 card.
{Speedrunner} regains 2 HP.
cards.flavorText: “I quit.{br}Ha, no I don't.{br}it's just faster to reload.”

cards.title: R.N.G. Manipulation
body: When a villain card would be played, you may play a card from under this card instead.
At the start of your turn, if there are no cards under this card, one villain target deals themself 2 melee damage, then destroy this card.
powers: Move 1 card from the villain trash or the top card of the villain deck under this card.

cards.title: Sequence Break
body: When a Hero target other than {Speedrunner} would be dealt damage by a non-hero card, you may redirect it to {Speedrunner}. If you do, one player may draw a card.
When this card is destroyed, one player may play a card.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “How'd you get past security!?{br}and you think [b]that's[/b] a weapon?”

cards.title: T.A.S.
body: increase damage dealt by {Speedrunner} by 1.
powers: One player may draw a card, a second player may play a card, and a third player may use a power. Destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “When ze is prepared,{br}zir reflexes may even match my own.”

cards.title: Turbo Controller
body: When you play a card outside of your play phase, you may draw a card. When you use a power outside of your power phase, {Speedrunner} deals 1 target 2 fire damage.
powers: {Speedrunner} deals 1 target 1 melee damage X times, where X = the number of your glitch and strat cards in play. If this damage destroys that target, destroy this card.

promoCards.title: Speedrunner
powers: Until the start of your next turn, when {Speedrunner} would be dealt damage by a target, ze first deals that target 1 projectile damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
Until the start of your turn, increase all projectile damage by 2.
Put one card from the villain or environment trash into play.

openingLines.default: if you don't have perfect reflexes, store bought is fine.
openingLines.Menagerie.UnmuteCharacter: have you seen vtubers though? maybe we both take a shot at them instead.
